timeline.message:
[#1272] Add SpanContext parameter to createCommandConsumer().

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: As the method later on calls span.context() I would expect the method to fail. Why not pass NoopSpan.INSTANCE?
timeline.author: ctron

replies.bodyText: The null stands for the SpanContext parameter here, and that may be null. So I don't think it is a problem.
replies.author: calohmn

replies.bodyText: Indeed, it looked to me like this was the Span parameter.
replies.author: ctron
